title: IoS-001 CANONICAL SCHEMA EXPANSION - 48H STATUS REPORT

section_1_g0_specification.recommendation: G0 specification complete. Ready for CEO review and G1 approval workflow.

Deliver signed mapping document for G1 approval
section_2_cdmo_airlock_confirmation.airlock_constraint: No migration executes until CDMO mapping is complete and signed.
section_2_cdmo_airlock_confirmation.current_state: All 50 crypto assets remain in AIRLOCK with default SPOT + AGGREGATED pending CDMO verification.

current_state.problem: Cannot distinguish Binance spot from Coinbase spot from aggregated data

section_3_exchange_mic_decomposition.governance_benefit: Exchange-level MIC enables Lane C microstructure research with full provenance.

section_4_risk_if_not_implemented.risk_paragraph: If CEO-DIR-2026-090 is not implemented now, IoS-003C Gate 2 cannot be approved because canonical ID tagging verification (Section 4.4 of IoS-003C) requires instrument_type distinction between spot and derivatives. Without this column, Lane C research (funding rates, liquidations, basis) will produce non-auditable conclusions that cannot distinguish whether price movements come from spot or perpetual markets. This is a Class A violation of ADR-013 (One-Source-of-Truth) and blocks the entire crypto regime research stream. The architectural blind spot identified in CEO-DIR-2026-089 Section 4.4.2 would remain unresolved, leaving FjordHQ's crypto research epistemically compromised.
blockers_if_delayed: IoS-003C Gate 2 BLOCKED (canonical ID verification impossible)
CRIO Lane C research BLOCKED (cannot distinguish spot from perp)
CEIO derivative ingestion BLOCKED (no instrument_type to tag)
section_4_risk_if_not_implemented.mitigation: Immediate execution of CEO-DIR-2026-090 per gate sequence

next_steps: CDMO executes asset mapping in AIRLOCK

principle: We build one canonical truth - and it holds in court.
